response.overview: The Dean (Drew Andrews) strives for a brotherhood in knowledge and he wants his students to be gentleman first and foremost. He learns that a fresh-faced student (Jason Nikas) has been peeping in the boy's lockerroom, watching pornos, drinking at pizza parties and participating in unatural sex acts with other men in the dorms after dark and explodes with rage. The Dean uses his large, manly hands and a firm wooden paddle to teach the young student a lesson. With his blond ass still burning and welted, the Dean has his nasty way with the sexy cock teaser. The Dean is now totally in charge as he makes the wayward student suck on his huge yardstick and endure a very probing anal inspection that ends up being a satisfying punishment for misbehavior that they BOTH enjoy!
response.title: The Dirty Dean of Discipline
